PLCClockTimeResult - Class in PLCCom
return PLC clock time

PLCCom - package PLCCom
 
PLCcomDevice - Class in PLCCom
abstract base class of device classes
PLCcomDevice() - Constructor for class PLCCom.PLCcomDevice
 
PPI_Device - Class in PLCCom
Represents the PLC PPI device
PPI_Device() - Constructor for class PLCCom.PPI_Device
standard constructor for PPI_Device


Example Code: private PPI_Device Device = new PPI_Device();
PPI_Device(String, int, int, eBaudrate) - Constructor for class PLCCom.PPI_Device
thew default constructor for PPI_Device


Example Code: private PPI_Device Device = new PPI_Device("COM2",0,2);
PPI_Device(String, int, int, eBaudrate, ePLCType) - Constructor for class PLCCom.PPI_Device
the default constructor for PPI_Device


Example Code: private PPI_Device Device = new PPI_Device("COM2", 0, 2,eBaudrate.b9600, ePLCType.S7_200_compatibel);
